todo.covid19response:
This channel is for sharing information, projects, resources, and asks relative to the COVID-19 emergency. See the pinned post for ways to get plugged in. Please also share projects you're working on.
This channel is to be used for the Brigade response to the COVID-19 pandemic. / Coordination with FEMA
